alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 5:29PM CDT until September 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Denison, or 9 miles northeast of Sherman, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Randell Lake, Ambrose, Boddie, and Carpenters Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
